TEXT.English: [NEWLINE][SPACE][SPACE][ICON_BULLET]Can upgrade units outside of national borders.

French.Text: [NEWLINE][SPACE][SPACE][ICON_BULLET]Can upgrade units outside of national borders.

German.Text: [NEWLINE][SPACE][SPACE][ICON_BULLET]Kann Einheiten außerhalb der nationalen Grenzen modernisieren.

TEXT.Italian: [NEWLINE][SPACE][SPACE][ICON_BULLET]E' possibile aggiornare le unità al di fuori dei confini nazionali.
TEXT.Spanish: [NEWLINE][SPACE][SPACE][ICON_BULLET]Puede actualizar unidades fuera de las fronteras nacionales.
TEXT.Finnish: [NEWLINE][SPACE][SPACE][ICON_BULLET]Can upgrade units outside of national borders.

TEXT.English: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Can only be Built on %s1_Name and Earlier Starts
